loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in working capital and buy and sell bread.

loans.name: Temuri

texts.en:
Temuri is from the Martvili district of West Georgia. He is 33 years old and lives with his wife, parents and grandmother. Temuri has requested loans from local financial institutions several times for the family business start-up but without any success. His loan requests were rejected all the time because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 

The only source of the income for the family is a monthly pension of Temuri’s father and grandmother as well as a small income earned by Temuri working as an auto mechanic locally. Besides that, the family owns a milk cow and produces dairy products with the received milk. The income is hardly enough for food for a five member family. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. 

Temuri requested a loan from Credo to start up the family business. His loan request was approved in the frames of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages a provision of business start-up and re-start-up credits with soft conditions to country rural poor that do not have access to credit products since they are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. With the received credit, Temuri will set up his auto repair workshop in Kutaisi (the nearby town). He will rent the building and serve the local drivers. Temuri will get a service fee, and the new business initiative financed with the Kiva start-up loan will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to set up an auto repair workshop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.en:
Jeannette is 24 years old. She sells electric supplies.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more electric supplies for resale. The profits from the business will be reinvested in the business.

loans.use: to buy more electric supplies for resale.

loans.name: Divino Nino Group

texts.es: EL banco comunal Divino Nino esta conformado por 9 integrantes, casados con hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Estos integrantes son originarios del sacue lugar que esta ubicado en la zona norte del país. Estas personas se caracterizan por ser honradas, trabajadoras, de buenas costumbres. En créditos anteriores han demostrado su responsabilidad de pago en tiempo y forma.  Lucia es la coordinadora del banco comunal la cual tiene  por actividad económica  la venta de cuajada ambulante y en su casa. La rutina diaria de Lucia es salir a las calles con una pana de unos 10 kg en su cabeza  unas  8 horas  diarias a vender cuajadas  a clientes fijos y eventuales. El gracias a esta actividad ha sido su medio de vida y el sustento de sus hijos. Luchando día a día para salir adelante. El financiamiento lo necesita para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra y venta de cuajada. El banco comunal Divino Nino agradece la ayuda que  los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The communal bank Divino Nino is made up of 9 members, married with children under their responsibility. These members are originally from El Sauce which is located in the northern zone of the country. These people are characterized as honest, hardworking, and well-mannered. In previous loans, they have demonstrated their payment responsibility in time and form.

Lucia is the coordinator of the communal bank who works in the sale of cuajada cheese, traveling and in her home. Lucia’s daily routine is to go out to the street with a bowl of about 10 kilograms on her head for about 8 hours a day to sell cuajada cheese to permanent and possible customers. The result of this activity has been her livelihood and the support of her children. She is struggling day to day to come out ahead. She needs the funding to invest in the working capital for the purchase and sale of cuajada cheese. The communal bank Divino Nino appreciates the help that the Kiva investors provide to these people of limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua to be able to have dignified work.

loans.use: to invest in the working capital for the purchase and sale of cuajada cheese.

loans.name: Grupo Triunfador Group

texts.es: El banco comunal el Grupo Triunfador esta conformado por 9 integrantes, madres solteras  con hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Estas integrantes son originarias del Sauce, lugar que esta ubicado en la zona norte del país. El Sauce se caracteriza por tener gente humilde, trabajadora, con ganas de superación personal. Ellas han demostrado en los créditos anteriores su responsabilidad de pago en tiempo y forma. Carla Estela es la coordinadora del banco comunal la cual vela por el buen funcionamiento del mismo, y apoyarse mutuamente en las diferentes actividades económicas de las integrantes. Carla Estela ella tiene por actividad económica la venta de leche ubicado en su casa de habitación la cual ofrece a  sus clientes fijos y eventuales. El financiamiento lo esta  necesitando para invertir en capital de trabajo como es la compra y venta de leche para ofrecer a su clientela. Las integrantes de este banco agradecen la ayuda que le brindan los inversionistas kiva a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de vida digno.
texts.en: The Grupo Triunfador communal bank is made up of 9 members. They are single motherw who are raising children. These members are from El Sauce, located in the northern part of the country.  lugar que esta ubicado en la zona norte del país. El Sauce is characterized as having humble people who are hardworking and want to get ahead. They have shown thmesleves in previous lloans to be responisble and puntual with their payments. Carla Estela is the coordinator of the communal bank. She cares for it's good functioning and the mutual support in different economic activities of the members. Carla Estela's activity is selling milk from her house to regular and incidental customers. She needs the loan to invest in working capital to buy millk and sell it to her customers. The members of this bank are grateful for the help offered by the Kiva investors to people of low income from poor countries like Nicaragua so that they can have a dignified way of life.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to buy and sell milk.

loans.name: Gela

texts.en:
Gela is 48 years old. He lives in a small village of the Baghdati district with his wife, two children (12 and 13 years old), and mother who is provided with a retirement pension. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a vineyard of 500 saplings, vine trees. They pick the grapes and produce wine and vodka. Gela also owns a plot of land where 100 nut trees are grown. He sells the harvested nuts, wine and vodka locally as well as in the nearby villages. Besides his agricultural activities, Gela also works as a house painter in his village and gets a monthly income.

Gela requested a loan to purchase a plot of land. After purchasing the land, he will cultivate it and grow maize. He will sell harvested maize at a good price. It will increase the income of the family, and they will be able to improve their living conditions. Gela awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land and grow maize.

loans.name: Otilia De Jesus

texts.es: Otilia de 43 años de edad, es una persona muy alegre y trabajadora, quien ha luchado por años para sacar a sus tres hijos adelante. Ella posee una venta de tortas mejicanas y otros platillos en una zona muy comercial y en donde existe una gran competencia ya que hay un gran número de comedores a su alrededor. Para poder contar con clientes fijos debe trabajar muy duro para brindar calidad en sus productos y poder brindar algo más que los demás. Es por esta razón que Otilia solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar: carne, queso, aderezos, queso, pan y otros más con lo que pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos y mejor calidad, lo que le permita contar con más clientes y mejorar sus compras.
texts.en: Otilia is 43 years old. She is a very happy and hardworking person, who has fought for years to get her children ahead. She owns a stand where she sells tortas and other Mexican dishes in a shopping area where there is great competition since there are a large number of kitchens around her. To be able to have regular customers, she must work very hard to offer quality products and to be able to offer more than others. It’s for this reason that Otilia is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL, in order to buy meat, cheese, seasonings, bread and more products of higher quality, which allows her to gain more customers and improve their purchases.

loans.use: purchase meat, cheese, seasonings, bread and other ingredients.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en: Nelson is a 43-year-old business man. He is married to Cecilia, a business lady. They are blessed with three children that go to school. He has been a blacksmith for the past ten years with monthly income of KES 3,000 which he uses to support his family. He is applying for his first loan of KES 10,000 from KADET LTD after being introduced to the organization by a KADET staff member. Nelson will use the loan to buy scrap metals. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to expand his business and improve his family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy scrap metals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance.

loans.name: Rosa Verónica

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón una bella y encantadora ciudad donde se dedica a la agricultura, el comercio y la ganadería, además de poseer estos lindos rubros también se dedica a las danzas nicaragüenses, es aquí donde habita Rosa Verónica. 

Rosa Verónica se llama la mujer de 39 años de edad, cuyo marido es agricultor, y apenas cubre el sustento diario de su hogar, con el salario que ella gana como profesora, cubre los gastos de estudios de sus dos hijos.

 Rosa Verónica  necesita un financiamiento de Kiva y Ceprodel de $600.00 para la compra de: Cementó, Arena y Ladrillo, dicho préstamo lo estará invirtiendo en mejora de su vivienda. 

De modo que su amor a su familia, lo poco que ella se gana y la honradez con que cuenta, podrá pagar en 16 meses la pequeña ayuda financiera que ella recibirá. 

Ella estima que a finales de año estará viviendo en una mejor vivienda, cuenta con  su amor al trabajo y su eterno amor a sus dos hijos donde sueña con verlos vivir en mejores condiciones, todo esto solo se lo puede cumplir a través del crédito que le financie Kiva y Ceprodel.
texts.en: Santa Rosa del Peñón is a beautiful and enchanting city where people make a living through agriculture, business, and livestock.  In addition to these lovely trades, people also do Nicaraguan dances.  This is where Rosa Verónica lives.  She is thirty-nine, and her husband is a farmer.  He barely covers their daily food costs.  With the wages she earns as a teacher, she covers their two children's education costs.  Rosa Verónica needs financing from Kiva and Ceprodel for $600 to buy cement, sand, and brick, which she will use to improve her home.  Out of love for her family, what little she earns and the honesty she has, she will be able to pay back in sixteen months the small financial help she will receive.  She believes that at the end of the  year, she will be living in an improved house.  She has love for her job and eternal love for her two children.  She dreams about seeing them live in better conditions.  All of this can be accomplished through the loan from Kiva and Ceprodel.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and brick.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
Doña Carmela es una mujer de 53 años muy trabajadora, tiene como recuerdo la triste partida de su esposo que fue de gran ayuda para lograr muchos objetivos mientras estuvo a su lado. Cuenta con el apoyo emocional y la compañía de su hijo Carlos de 30 años, quien está siempre pendiente de ella. Ella es poseedora de una vivienda hecha de adobe, donde actualmente habita. Dedicada a la producción de cacao y con mas de 30 años de experiencia, continua desempeñándose con la misma motivación ya que esta muy orgullosa de contar desde siempre con las parcelas que adquirió su esposo días después de haberse casado. Hoy,cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes son familiares directos y sobrinos, pues indica, es una de las mejores maneras de trabajar con gente de confianza. Considera que la producción de cacao es una de las mejores maneras de ganarse la vida ya que sus tierras son muy fértiles en cuanto humedad se refiere generándole buenas ganancias a corto y largo plazo. No obstante uno de los causales de sus constantes preocupaciones es que al lado de una de sus parcelas circula un río, siendo muy beneficioso para sus cultivos.
Al encontrarse en plena etapa de mantenimiento de los árboles de cacao, considera que debe darle toda la atención, pues de ello dependerá la calidad de los granos a comercializarse, es por ello que debe contar con abono orgánico suficiente así como capital suficiente para contratar personal encargado del deshierbo.
A futuro planea realizar la construcción de su vivienda a base de concreto y ladrillos esto con el afán de cumplir uno de sus sueños que tiene planeado heredar a sus nietos. Cuenta actualmente con 7 créditos con los cuales a presentado una buena conducta crediticia permitiéndole trabajar de manera fluida. Es una persona muy atenta en sus reuniones de su banco comunal. Con los 1,000 realizará la compra de sacos de abono orgánico así como la contrata de jornaleros para el debido deshierbo de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Carmela is a hardworking woman of 53 years of age. She remembers the sad parting of her husband who was a big help in achieving many goals while he was at her side. She has the emotional support and the company of her son, Carlos, who is 30 years old, who has always devoted his attention to her.

She is the owner of a house made of adobe where she currently lives. She works growing cocoa and has more than thirty years experience, continuing to carry on with the same motivation, as she is always very proud of the lots she acquired days after getting married. Today, she has the support of laborers who are immediate family members and nephews, and as is known, one of the best ways to work is with people you trust.

She considers the production of cocoa one of the best ways to make a living and her land is very fertile as well as moist generating good profit in the short and long term. However, one of the grounds of constant concerns is that next to one of her plots a river circulates, as it is very beneficial to her crops.

Being in the middle stage of the maintenance of cocoa trees, she believes she should give it all her attention, because the quality of the grains will determine the marketing of it, which is why she needs sufficient organic compost as well as sufficient capital in order to contract to manage the weeding.

In the future she plans to construct a house of concrete and bricks to fulfill the urge to complete one of her dreams of a planned inheritance for her grandchildren. She has had seven loans and has a good credit history permitting her work to go smoothly. She is an attentive person at the meetings of her communal bank. With the 1,000 [soles] she will buy bags of organic compost as well as contract laborers to weed the crops.

loans.use: to buy organic compost and to pay for laborers

loans.name: Ivania Del Rosario

texts.es:
En el Municipio del jicaral una preciosa ciudad dedicada en diferentes actividades ubicada en el departamento de León, la señora Ivania del Rosario es conocida como una persona Responsable Honesta y Trabajadora.

Ivania del Rosario es casada cuenta con cinco hijo bajo su cargo, cuatro de ellas estudian y el otro es menor de edad, su esposo se dedica a la venta de ropa ambulante en las comarcas más aledañas del municipio, sus principales  funciones es desempeñar el cargo de profesora de educación primaria.

Ivania del rosario mantiene a su familia y asegura que su hijo vallan a recibir la educación que se merecen, por eso necesita un financiamiento para la compra de una computadora para el beneficio de sus 4 hijos quienes necesitan mucho de ella para un mejor aprendizaje, ha descubierto que Kiva y Ceprodel le puede dar este tipo de financiamiento.

De momento solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo y la honradez que en el pasado le ha permitido mantener un buen crédito, con lo poco que su esposo gana como comerciante, ayuda con el sustento de su casa, es por tal razón que solicita a kiva y Ceprodel que le financien este tipo de crédito para cumplir con sus sueños principales de darle una mejor educación a sus hijos.

"Agradezco a Dios como primer instancia por haberme encontrado con Ceprodel y Kiva, para que estos le sigan dando la mano amigable para seguir adelante en su vida".
texts.en:
In the Jicaral Municipality, a lovely city dedicated to different activities located in the León department, Ivania del Rosario is known as a responsible, honest, and hardworking person.

Ivania del Rosario is married with five children under her care, four of which study and the other a minor. Her husband works in travelling clothing sales in the neighboring municipalities. Her main function is to work as a primary education teacher.

Ivania del Rosario supports her family and ensures that her children receive the education that they deserve. For this, she needs funding to buy a computer for the benefit of her four children who need a lot from her for better learning.  She has discovered that Kiva and Ceprodel can give her this type of funding.

At this moment she only counts on her good health, her capacity to work, and the honor that in the past has permitted her to maintain good credit. With the little that her husband earns as a merchant, she helps with the maintenance of her home. It is for this reason that she is applying to Kiva and Ceprodel to fund this type of credit to achieve her main dream of giving better education to her children.

“I thank God first of all for having found myself with Ceprodel and Kiva, so that they will continue to give me a friendly hand to continue ahead in my life.”

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Damaris Elieta

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón se Llama el municipio donde habita la señora Damaris Elieta, es un pequeño pueblito, pero encantador donde existen diversos tipos de actividades, como es el comercia y la ganadería.

Es soltera cuenta con un hijo bajo su cargo y sus principales  funciones es desempeñar el cargo de maestra de educación primaria.

Damaris mantiene a su único hijo y asegura que valla a la escuela con mucha necesidad. 

Solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo, su pequeña vivienda que la ha ido construyendo con créditos que le ha financiado Kiva y Ceprodel, con lo poco que ella gana a duras penas ajusta para la alimentación de su familia y cubrir los estudio de su hijo, hoy en día le solicita a Ceprodel y Kiva que le financie un pequeño crédito  para poderse pagar a un plazo de 12 meses.

Dicho financiamiento lo estará invirtiendo en la compra de: Cemento Arena y ladrillo, para poder reparar su vivienda y vivir en mejores condiciones con su familia. .
texts.en:
Damaris Elieta lives in the small, but enchanting, town of Santa Rosa del Peñón, where people pursue different work such as business and raising livestock. Damaris Elieta is the single mother of a son, and she is an elementary school teacher. She supports her child and says she needs to teach. She is healthy and able to work.

She built her small house with loans financed by Kiva and Ceprodel. She works hard for her low salary, which just covers her family´s food and her son´s education. She is now applying for small loan with Ceprodel and Kiva to be repaid over 12 months. She will use the loan to buy cement, sand, and bricks to repair her house so that she and her family can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and bricks.

loans.name: Ana Meyvi

texts.es: Ana Meyvi de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su  hija; ella se dedica a la compra y venta de producto por catalogo, cremas, cosméticos, perfumes entre otros, tiene varios años de trabajar en el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante por todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por los buenos precios, el producto de calidad y sobre todo por el buen servicio; Ana es una mujer enérgica, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante todos los días pone su mayor esfuerzo porque sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito, como toda buena comerciante ahora que aumento la demanda, quiere realizar una nueva inversión y extender el negocio pero para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita cosméticos, perfumes, cremas, etc . Ana Meyvi  tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente muy agradecida con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Ana Meyvi is 29 years old and lives with her life partner and her daughter. She buys and sells catalog products such as creams, cosmetics, perfumes and other items. She has seven years experience in the business, and has gained a great deal of experience which allows her to obtain the best earnings. 

She sells from home and door to door all around the community, and already has a large clientele who prefer her because of the good prices, quality products, and above all the good service. 

Ana is an energetic woman, devoted to her work and with a strong desire to succeed. Every day she does her very best because she knows that only this way will she achieve success. 

As with every good businesswoman, now that the demand has increased, she wants to undertake a new investment and expand the business. But for this, she needs the support of working capital. This is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy cosmetics, perfumes, creams, etc. 

Ana Meyvi has good payment references and is very responsible. She is very grateful for the support, and says that she will be able to pay off the debt. At the same time she is confident that she will give her family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, perfumes and creams.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
El Sauce es un bello municipio de occidente rodeado de montañas florecidas por la temporada de invierno donde abunda la leche y cuajada que producen sus habitantes.

En él hay muchas personas que se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras y luchadoras como es el caso de María Lourdes una señora de 44 años, madre soltera de dos hijos estudiantes de secundaria, se dedica a laborar como profesora de primaria desde hace 25 años, labor que tiene un gran mérito porque son personas con gran espíritu para enseñar y preparar a grandes profesionales que son el futuro de nuestro país.

Es una mujer de ser admirada por la sociedad Sauceña porque está preparando sola a sus hijos sin la ayuda del padre y con su pequeño salario lucha por tener una vivienda digna.

Gracias a su profesión hoy tiene su propia vivienda la que ha ido mejorando poco a poco con la ayuda de créditos y la que quiere ir ampliando para brindarles un buen patrimonio a sus hijos, por tal motivo solicita a Kiva un crédito para pagarlo con su salario en 15 meses para la compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra con el fin de construir un porche para tener más espacio.

Confía en Dios que su solicitud sea aprobada por estos inversionistas de buen corazón que ayudan a cumplir sus sueños a las personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en: El Sauce is a beautiful western city surrounded by mountains in bloom in the winter where milk and cuajada, a cheese that the locals produce, are abundant.  There are many people here who are hard-working and determined, like in the case of María Lourdes.  She is forty-four and a single mother of two children who are in high school.  She has made a living working as an elementary school teacher for twenty-five years.  This work is of great merit because people that teach have a great spirit and prepare professionals who are the future of our country.  She is a woman who is admired by people in El Sauce because she is taking care of her children alone without the help of their father.  With her small salary, she fights to have a dignified life.  Thanks to her job, today she has her own home, which she has improved little by little with the help of loans.  She wants to expand it to offer a good inheritance to her children, which is why she is requesting a loan from Kiva.  She will pay it back with her salary in fifteen months and will use it to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and labor to construct a porch to have more space.  She trusts in God that her request will be approved by these good-hearted investors that will help her to fulfill the dreams of people with scarce resources.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and labor.

loans.name: Catalina Modesta

texts.es: La Sra. Catalina tiene 52 años, la Sra. es viuda tiene dos  hijos ya independientes,  ella se dedica a la venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona de Cotapachi,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Catalina  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de de insumos como arroz, fideo y papa por mayor  para la elaboración de sus platillos  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de platillos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Catalina va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos y así mejorando sus ingresos, La Sra. Catalina es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que esta es la única actividad con la que saco adelante a su familia y le permite mantenerse.
texts.en:
Catalina, 52, is a widow with two grown children. She sells food from a stall in Cotapachi. This is her first loan cycle with the institution. Catalina will use the loan to buy wholesale supplies such as rice, noodles, and potatoes to prepare an even wider variety of her dishes for her customers. 

Catalina wishes to continue improving her business with this loan.  She will use her profits to buy more supplies and to increase her income. Catalina works very hard and is happy with the opportunity offered to her since this is the only work she has to support herself and see her family get ahead.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies such as rice, noodles, and potatoes.

loans.name: Delmy Ruth

texts.es: Delmy Ruth de cuarenta y dos años de edad  vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; Ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, pan, huevos, embutidos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, esta ubicada en su vivienda y es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad por lo que ya tiene clientela fija que la prefiere por los buenos precios, la calidad y el servicio excelente; Delmy es una mujer dedicada a su labor y a toda su familia son las dos cosas mas importantes en su vida, se esfuerza todos los días por ofrecerles un futuro mejor y una vida digna, esta pendiente de todo lo que necesitan, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y quiere realizar una nueva inversión pero Delmy no cuenta con el suficiente capital que la respalde por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas etc., Delmy Ruth tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Delmy Ruth is 42 years old, and lives with her life partner and her children in their own house. She has a store where she sells basic household necessities such as staple grains, milk, bread, eggs, cold cuts, and other items. She has several years with the business and has acquired a great deal of sales experience.

Her store is located in her home and is very well-known by local people, so she already has a regular clientele who prefer her for the good prices, quality, and excellent service. 

Delmy is a woman devoted to her work and to her entire family; they are the two most important things in her life. She does her best every day to offer her family a better future and a decent life. She is attentive to all their needs.

In recent months, demand has increased and she wants to undertake a new investment. But Delmy does not have sufficient working capital to support her in this. That is why she made up her mind to apply to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy staple grains, candy, instant products, drinks, etc.

Delmy Ruth has good payment references and is very responsible. She is confident she will be able to pay off the debt in the established timeframe, and at the same time give her family a full life.

loans.use: To buy staple grains, candy, instant products, and drinks.

loans.name: Erick Yobannie

texts.es: Erick Yobannie de veintiocho años de edad  vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo, en casa propia; Él es un empleado  de una empresa de textiles es responsable, humilde y muy luchador siempre esta buscando las mejores alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito,  Erick es un hombre dedicado a su labor y a toda su familia son las dos cosas mas importantes en su vida, se esfuerza todos los días por ofrecerles un futuro mejor y una vida digna, esta pendiente de todo lo que necesitan, en los últimos meses la casa ha tenido deterioros y necesita la construir un nuevo cuarto para seguridad y comodidad de los que la habitan, pero Erick no cuenta con el suficiente capital que la respalde por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tejas, cemento, ladrillos, piso, herramientas etc., Erick Yobannie tiene buenas referencias de pago y esta feliz con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Erick Yobannie is 28 years old and lives with his life companion and son in his own house. He is an employee of a textile company. He is responsible, humble and a fighter always looking for better alternatives that allow him to succeed.

Erick is a man dedicated to his work and to his family, and they are the two most important things in his life. He strives every day to give them a better future and a dignified life, and is attentive to everything they need. 

During the last months the house has had damage and he needs to build a new room for security and to make it more comfortable to live in. But Erick does not have sufficient cash to back it and this is why he has decided to ask for a loan through Integral in order to buy tiles, cement, bricks, floor, tools, etc.

Erick Yobannie has good payment references and is happy for the support, and is sure that he can pay off the loan in the established period and at the same time he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy tiles, cement, floor, bricks, and tools to build a new room for his house for purposes of security and the comfort of his family

loans.name: Irma Flor

texts.es: Irma Flor de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija, ella posee una venta de bebidas licuados y jugos naturales, ubicada en su vivienda en una comunidad muy transitada de personas, tiene varios años con su pequeño negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite alcanzar muy buenas ganancias, comercia para todos los vecinos y aledaños, ellos la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Irma es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le den un futuro mas prospero, por lo que día a día se esfuerza al máximo para alcanzar su objetivo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas, leche y mantenimiento de licuadoras y extractor, etc. Irma Flor tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Irma Flor is 48 years old and lives with her life partner and her daughter. She has a stand selling drinks, fruit shakes and natural juices. It is located in her home and in a community with a lot of pedestrian traffic. She has several years with her small business and has gained a great deal of experience, which allows her to achieve very good earnings. 

She sells to all her neighbors and people in surrounding areas. They prefer her because everything she sells is top quality and affordable, and especially because the service is excellent. 

Irma is an enterprising woman, devoted to her work. She is always looking for opportunities that will give her a more prosperous future, so day by day she does her very best to achieve her goal. In recent months, demand has increased and she wants to undertake a new investment. But she does not have sufficient working capital. That is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy fruit and milk and maintain her blenders and juicer, etc. 

Irma Flor has good payment references and is very responsible. She is confident she will be able to pay off the debt. At the same time she has faith that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fruit and milk, and maintain her blenders and juicer.

loans.name: Maria Yanira

texts.es: María Yanira de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su familia; ella se dedica a la  venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, posee en variedad camisas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia de forma ambulante y desde su hogar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles, con producto de calidad y con un servicio excelente; María es una mujer emprendedora y muy dedicada a su labor, siempre esta luchando por lo que desea y no piensa rendirse hasta alcanzar el éxito que se merece, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. María Yanira tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
María Yanira is 35 years old and lives with her family. She sells women's, men's, and children's clothing. She has a variety of shirts, skirts, dresses, pants and other items. She has several years with the business and this has given her a great deal of experience which allows her to obtain the best earnings. 

She sells door-to-door and from her home and has gained a large clientele. People prefer her because she always has what they need; at affordable prices, with quality products and excellent service. 

Maria is an enterprising woman and very devoted to her work. She is always striving for what she wants, and does not consider giving up until she achieves the success she deserves. 

In recent months demand has increased, and she wants to take advantage of this to undertake a new investment. But she does does not have the working capital to support this. This is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy clothing at wholesale.

María Yanira has good payment references and is very responsible. She says she will be able to pay off the debt, and at the same time is confident that she will bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: To buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Kuthu Group

texts.en:
Kuthu is a group of 11 tribal women in the northeastern part of India, in the state of Manipur, Makhan village. Seeing the benefits and the impact of empowerment on the existing Self Help Group borrowers of the village encouraged these women to form a group, so they can collectively help one another expand their businesses.

Paokenwiliu, the one with the raised hand, is 26 years old. Her husband, 36 years of age, works as a teacher in a private school. He earns a very low salary. In order to supplement her household income, Paokenwiliu opened a garment store about 3 km from her village with the help of her father-in-law. Now the family's income comes from her clothing business sales too. 

With this loan of 5,000 Indian rupees (INR), Paokenwiliu wants to construct a bigger store where she can accommodate more clothes to sell for a bigger profit and more savings. The loan will be used to buy building materials for the expansion of her shop. With a budget of 1,700 INR, she will purchase roof sheet/tin sheet and use the remaining 3,300 INR to purchase women's garments, such as tops, lingerie and footwear.

In order to save more, Paokenwiliu works in a homestead garden where she grows vegetables such as cabbage, mustard leaves, corn, coriander, spring onions and ginger for her family's consumption to reduce buying meals. She dreams of supporting her son (8 months) through to higher education without any financial constraint.

Likewise, the rest of her group members are keen on expanding their businesses. Two of the members supply Paokenwiliu with clothes, and one member wishes to expand her piggery farm by bringing in more piglets. One wishes to open a yarn store. Two other members jointly opened a tea stall – the only tea stall in the village – where they serve up to 100 customers a day. With the loan, they wish to expand the tea stall aiming to accommodate more customers and keep more menus for the customers. In these ways, the group, with their respective businesses, collectively wishes to improve their lives by focusing on their children's education, so that they may have a better future.

loans.use: to buy building materials and ladies garments for the expansion of her clothing store.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
Doña Emiliana de 43 años una madre abnegada , lleva una vida conyugal con Segundino quien a su vez padre de sus 5 hijos , juntos desempeñan el rol de una familia muy unida de apoyo y trabajo mutuo, comparten sus vivencias en una casa hecha a base de adobe de la cual es propietaria. Desempeña actividades agrícolas consistentes en la producción de cacao y café, priorizando la cantidad de terreno para éste ultimo por ser mas rentable. Viene desempeñándose en el rubro desde hace 16 años en un terreno que adquirió con Segundino y que le ha valido para trabajar y ganar lo suficiente para educar a sus hijos. Cuenta con el apoyo directo de jornaleros que contrata y teniendo en ocasiones la ayuda de sus hijos cuando estaba en temporada de vacaciones. Una de las cosas que le agradan es observar los sacos de café apilados a punto de ser llevados a la ciudad para ser comercializados, es cuando recuerda todo el trabajo empleado y ahora es bien remunerado. Así como toda actividad comercial requiere invertir en insumos, planta de café y abono orgánico, desea contar con un crédito. Por tanto, sería su crédito número siete, y se compromete desde ya a ser muy puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, asimismo comenta que le agrada mucho trabajar con sus compañeros de su banco comunal ya que considera que es un grupo muy unido cuya junta directiva sabe como administrar los fondos para beneficio de todos.
Con los 4,000 nuevos soles complementará su capital que será destinado para la compra de un terreno, adicional a ello herramientas y sacos de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
43-year-old Doña Emiliana is an unselfish mother who lives a married life with Segundino, who in turn is the father of their five children.  Together they carry out the role of a family very united in support and mutual work; they share their experiences in a house made of adobe of which she is the owner.  They carry out agricultural activities consisting of cocoa and coffee production, prioritizing the quantity of land for the latter to be more profitable.  They have been working in this field for 16 years on land that Segundino acquired and that has suited her for working and earning what is enough to educate their children.  She relies on the direct help of laborers that she hires, and on occasions she has the help of her children when they are in the holiday season.  One of the things that pleases her is to watch the heaping sacks of coffee when they are on the verge of being carried to the city to be sold; when she remembers all of the work she has done and that she is now well-paid.  

Like in all commercial activity, she is required to invest in supplies like coffee plants and organic fertilizer, so she desires to have a loan.  Therefore, it would be her seventh loan, and she promises to be on time with her repayments starting right now. She also says that it pleases her very much to work with the partners in her communal bank because she considers them to be a very close-knit group whose board of directors know how to administer the funds to the benefit of everyone.  With the 4,00 nuevos soles she will supplement the capital that will be used to purchase land, in addition to tools and sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy land, farming tools, and sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Cristo Nos Ama Group

texts.es: EL banco comunal Cristo nos Ama está conformado por 10 integrantes, en la edades comprendidas de 25 a 60 años de edad. Casados con  15 hijos bajo sus responsabilidad. Estos integrantes son originarios del departamento de  León, lugar que se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, con gente honrada, muy acogedora, con ganas de superación personal. Todos tienen diferentes actividades económicas, pero se apoyan mutuamente porque para ellos ha sido una forma de vida y de sus familias. Dominga es la coordinadora del banco comunal Cristo nos Ama y tiene por actividad económica una pulpería ubicado en su casa de habitación. Una pulpería es una tienda que vende productos comestibles de consumo diario en pequeñas cantidades como: sobre de café. Caja de fosforo, sobre de shampoo, arroz, crema, detergente, jabón, pan, leche, leña. El financiamiento lo  necesita para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su pulpería para mejorar sus ganancias y su clientela. El banco comunal Cristo nos Ama agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a  personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como Nicaragua para tener un medio de vida digno.
texts.en:
Cristo nos Ama (Christ loves us) is a communal bank made up of 10 members from the ages of 25 to 60, married with 15 children under their care. These members are natives of Leon, a place that is known for being a tourist area, with honest and friendly people, wanting to excel. Everyone has different economic activities; however they support one another because it’s been a way of life for them and their families. 

Dominga is the coordinator of the communal bank Cristo nos Ama and has a general store located in her house. A general store is a store that sells everyday consumer products in small amounts such as small coffee packets, matches, shampoo packets, rice, cream, detergent, soap, bread, milk and firewood. Funding is needed to invest in working capital to supply the general store in order to improve profits and customers. 

The communal bank Cristo nos Ama is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders provide to low-economic individuals and poor countries like Nicaragua to have a decent life.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and to supply the general store with products such as small coffee packets, matches, shampoo packets, rice, cream, detergent, soap, bread, milk and firewood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance on her motorbike.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is 22 years old and lives in the town of Lugazi in the Mukono region of Uganda. She is married and has 2 children with 1 of them currently in school. For the past 3 years, Annet has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells posho, sugar and cooking oil. 

To help expand her business, Annet has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more inventory such as rice, maize flour and sugar for resale. The loan will help Annet to generate greater profits and increase her income. Annet hopes that in the future she will be able to expand on her business. 

Annet is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more inventory such as rice, maize flour and sugar for resale.

loans.name: César

texts.es:
César es un padre de familia de 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y a sus 3 hijos en uno de los caseríos que conforman la parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona semi tropical situada en la región Piura, caracterizada por su producción de frutas para exportación. La zona en donde reside cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica.

La actividad que desarrolla es el negocio de crianza y venta de animales, el cría animales menores en su domicilio y cuando toman peso y tamaño adecuado son comercializados en la zona, César atiende permanentemente este negocio y cuenta con clientela ya establecida. Ademas cuenta con un terreno de cultivo en donde tiene instalados árboles frutales. El cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en ambas actividades y usualmente es ayudado por su esposa.

César se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado para los animales y fertilizante para su cultivo, de ese modo espera aumentar sus ingresos y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
César is a 35-year old family man.  He lives with his wife and their three children in one of the villages that make up the rural part of Tambogrande District.  The semi-tropical area is situated in the Piura Region, which is characterized by its export fruit production.  The area where César lives has electricity. 

César 's business is raising and selling animals.  He raises young animals at his home and when they reach the right weight and size, they are sold in the area.  This is César's main business, and he has an established clientele.  In addition, he has a plot of land on which he planted fruit-bearing trees.  He has more than five years of experience in both activities and his wife usually helps him. 

César is requesting a loan from 800 nuevos soles (USD $325) from Edpyme Alternativa, which he intends to invest in the purchase of animal feed for his livestock and fertilizer for his crops.  In this way, he hopes to increase his income and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed for his animals and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is 32 years old. She sells foodstuffs and has been in this business for the past 3 years. Her husband works as a driver. They have three children who attend school. She would like to add more foodstuffs to her inventory such as cassava and bananas. The profits from the business will be used to create savings.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and cassava for selling.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 64-year-old businessman. He is married to Domitila, a businesswoman, and they are blessed with two children. David has been in the livestock trading business for the past 10 years. He earns a monthly income of KES 6,890, which he uses to support his family. 
 
He is applying for his fifth loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. David will use the loan to buy more goats and sheep to fatten and sell later at a profit.

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to transport livestock to the nearby market.

loans.use: to buy more goats and sheep.

loans.name: Theophile

texts.en: Theophile is 23 years old and single. He runs a transportation business using a motorbike. He has been working as a motorcyclist for the past five years. He wants this loan to buy another motorbike to use in his business to increase his earnings. The profits from the business will be used to buy a plot of land, where he expects to build a house to live in.

loans.use: To buy another motorbike to use in his transportation business.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en: Reynaldo is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has five children. Reynaldo has a business raising and selling pigs. He has had this business for seven years. He has requested a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy feed for the pigs. Reynaldo has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Reynaldo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy feed for his pigs.

loans.name: Isabella

texts.en:
Isabella is 16 years old and lives in the town of Lugazi in the Mukono region of Uganda. For the past two years, Isabella has been working hard to manage her poultry farm, raising chickens. 

To help expand her business, Isabella has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more chicks and will help Isabella generate greater profits and buy essential needs at home. Isabella hopes that in the future she will be able to increase her business. 

Isabella is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more chicks.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталья – из Каменки. Она выращивает помидоры, огурцы, редис в тепличных условиях.  Наталья имеет четыре большие теплицы и теплицу для рассады. Она занимается этим бизнесом уже около 16 лет. В прошлом году Наталья влезла в долг из-за серьезной болезни и скоропостижной смерти отца – пришлось много средств потратить на лечение, она с трудом рассчиталась с долгами. 
Дополнительные средства в размере 15 000 гривен необходимы Наталье с целью установки отопительной системы в теплицах. Для проведения отопления Наталье необходимо приобрести металлическую трубу за 10 000 гривен, пластиковую трубу за 2 000 гривен, а остальные 3 000 гривен пойдут на приобретении краников, электродвигателей и креплений. На данный момент она хочет сделать отопление в двух теплицах, а на следующий год планирует провести его еще в двух других.
texts.en:
Natalya is from Kamenki.  She grows tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes in greenhouses.  She has four large greenhouses, as well as greenhouses for seedlings.  She has been in this line of work for about 16 years.  Last year, Natalya fell into debt because of a serious illness and the sudden death of her father - she had to spend heavily on medical care and could hardly pay it back.

Natalya needs an additional 15,000 hryvnas install a heating system in her greenhouses.  In order to conduct the heat, she needs to buy a metal pipe for 10,000 hryvnas, plastic pipe for 2,000 hryvnas and she needs an additional 3,000 hryvnas for taps, electrical components and fixings.  At the moment, she wants to heat two of her greenhouses, but next year she hopes to heat the other two.

loans.use: to install a heating system in her greenhouses.

loans.name: Hernando

texts.es:
Hernando es un hombre comerciante quien tiene 46 años de edad, el esta casado y vive en Sololá. Tiene 4 hijos de ellos 2 varones que estudian y lo ayudan en el negocio y dos mujeres que ayudan en los oficios domésticos de la casa. 
El tiene actualmente una tienda de abarrotes ubicado en una estación de buses a pocos metros de su vivienda, cuenta con cuatro años de realizar esta actividad lo inicio viendo que la demanda de personas que transitan en este lugar le daría buen resultado la apertura de este negocio.
Hasta ahora las ventas han mejorado dejándole buen resultado en sus ganancias  para mantener a toda su familia. Ahora en esta temporada del año ha visto que la demanda de ventas de varios productos que se consume en esta temporada aumenta de este modo solicita un presta de              Q 10,000.00  para comprar variedad de abarrotes para ampliar su negocio.
De este modo el tendrá mejores ganancias para seguir mejorando la economía de su familia.
Construir una vivienda para sus hijos y d arle mejores estudios académicos es su mayor sueño todo esto es con las ganancias que le deje su negocio.
texts.en:
Hernando is a businessman who is 46 years old. He is married and lives in Sololá . He has 4 children; two boys who study and help him with the business and two women who help him with household chores. He currently has a grocery store located in a bus station a few meters from his home. He has had this business for 4 years. He noticed that the amount of people that pass through this place would provide good results for  his business.

So far sales have improved providing him with good result in profits to support his family. Now, at this time of year he has seen that demands for various products consumed in this season increasing therefore he is requesting a loan of 10,000 Guatemalan Quetzal to buy groceries to expand his business. This way he will have improved profits to continue improving his family’s economic status.

Building a house for his children and providing them with better academic studies is his biggest dream, all this is with the profits from his business.

loans.use: to buy groceries to expand his store.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María tiene 30 años de edad, es soltera y no cuenta con dependientes, vive junto a sus padres en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito de Lambayeque, una zona comercial y agrícola. La zona es de un estilo de vida bastante humilde y rudimentario.

Se dedica a trabajar en la crianza y venta de animales menores, ella cría sus animales en su domicilio y cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes de la zona y vecinos. Adicionalmente  siembra y vende alfalfa y camote. Los ingresos que obtiene de estas actividades le sirven para ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. Ella cuenta con experiencia de 06 años en el negocio.

Actualmente se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles. El préstamo será destinado para la compra de más animales, alimento balanceado y ademas piensa hacer algunos arreglos en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Maria is 30 years old, single and has no dependents. She lives next to her parents in a small village that make up the district of Lambayeque, which is a commercial and agricultural area.  The life style in the area is very humble and rudimentary.

She works out of her home breeding young animals.  Once they reach a mature age, she puts them up for sale to merchants and neighbors in the area.  In addition, she grows and sells alfalfa and yams. 

The income she receives from these activities allows her to help support her family’s economic needs.  She has six years experience in her business.

At the present time, she is asking Edpyme Atlernativa for a 1500 New Soles (PEN) loan.  The loan would be intended to buy more animals and animal feed.  She also intends to make a few home improvements.

loans.use: to buy more animals and animal feed. She also intends to make a few home improvements.

loans.name: Gloriose

texts.en: Gloriose is 23. She sells soap and has been in the business for two years. She wants to increase her sales volume with this loan so that she can become a wholesaler in the future. She plans to use the profits to make savings.

loans.use: to buy more soap to sell.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es:
Eulalia de 33 años es una madre de 5 hijos, junto a su pareja Félix de 39 años desempeñan su rol como padres de manera responsable y con principios. Desde hace algún tiempo viene planeando realizar la construcción de su vivienda con material, pues actualmente habitan en una de madera. Su principal actividad es la producción de cacao, trabajo que para ella lo considera muy sencillo, pues posee parcelas de tierra que ofrece mejores condiciones agrícolas. Lleva 15 años como productora de cacao, siendo muy conocida en su zona. Cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes la ayudan para el mantenimientos de sus plantas, como sacar la malea y podar la planta de cacao. 
Una de las actividades que más le agrada es la cosecha, porque es cuando disfruta el ver los frutos de cacao coloridos y apilados para luego ser abiertos y puestos al secado , eso para ella significa una buena producción. Ahora, le ha ofrecido venderlo una parcela de tierra colindante a la suya, por lo que no desea escapar esta oportunidad. Por tanto, sería su octavo crédito en MFP, para lograr comprar dicho terreno y en ella ampliar la siembre de cacao.
texts.en:
Eulalia is a 33 year old mother of five children.  Together with her husband, 39 year old Félix, she carries out the role of responsible, principled parenting.  For some time they have been planning on building a house from quality materials, as the one they currently live in is made from wood.  Their main business is producing cacao, a job that she feels is very simple.  She has parcels of land that offer the best agricultural conditions.  She has been a cacao producer for 15 years and is well-known in her area.  She counts on the help of day laborers who aid in maintaining the plants, pulling the weeds and pruning the cacao plants.  
One of the activities that she finds the most gratifying is the harvest.  That is when she can enjoy seeing the colorful cacao fruit all piled up to later be opened and put out to dry.  For Eulalia, this signifies a good production.  Recently, someone has offered to sell her a parcel of land adjacent to her own, and Eulalia doesn't want to miss out on the opportunity.  Therefore, this eighth loan with MFP would be to purchase said plot of land, on which she could expand her cacao plantings.

loans.use: to purchase a parcel of land.

loans.name: Iliana

texts.es: Sra. Iliana  tiene 24 años, es casada con un hijo que tiene la edad de 9 años,  ella se dedica al comercio minorista, ofreciendo variedad de productos de dormitorio como juego de sabanas, edredones  y almohadas,  y cortinas ella  entrega a distintos  puestos de venta y domicilios, ya que le hacen pedidos ella entrega sus productos a crédito, este préstamo es el  primero que ha tomado con la institución, la Sra. Iliana  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de juegos de sabanas por mayor  y cortinas ya que tiene muchos pedidos, la Sra. Iliana  enfrenta retos en su negocio que es la demanda que hay de nuevos productos y va a utilizar los beneficios en una mejor atención con la compra de variedad de productos, la Sra. Iliana  se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Sra. Iliana is 24 years old.  She is married and has one nine-year old son.  She makes her living as a retailer.  Sra. Iliana sells a variety of bedroom products like sheet sets, comforters, pillows and curtains.  She makes deliveries to various places of sale and households, as she sells on orders and delivers on credit.  This loan is her first with the institution.  Sra. Iliana is going to use this loan to purchase wholesale sheet sets and curtains, as she has a lot of orders to fill.  Sra. Iliana faces challenges in her business, like the demand for new products.  She is going to use the benefit of her loan to improve her customer service by purchasing a variety of products.  Sra. Iliana feels happy with and grateful to the institution for the help they have offered in granting her the loan.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale sheet sets and curtains.

loans.name: Jeanne D'arc

texts.fr:
Madame Jeanne d’Arc  est mariée et âgée de 33 ans.  Elle fait le commerce de papeterie et vidéothèque. Elle a un seul enfant qui a une année. Une autre personne est en sa charge et son enfant n’a pas encore atteint l’âge d’aller à l’école. Elle est née au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est licence.
Elle a commencé de travailler avec ACB Ltd depuis 2009 et le cycle actuel est le 2ème pour elle.  Etant la commerçante de divers objets dans une papeterie et vidéothèque, Jeanne d’Arc veut acheter les instruments de sonorisation suivants : 1 amplificateur, 2 baffles, 1 microphone et 1 ordinateur portable pour renforcer son vidéothèque. Elle n’envisage aucune autre difficulté de remboursement si et seulement si le vol ou la maladie n’interviennent pas.
Pour accroitre davantage son commerce, elle va utiliser les stratégies suivantes : bon accueil des clients, satisfaction des clients et utilisation des outils et matériels modernes.  Comme ambitions, elle va accroitre son commerce jusqu’à ce qu’il donne beaucoup de bénéfices. Pour la famille, elle va scolariser son enfant, aménager sa maison et augmenter son niveau nutritif (manger bien). Autres informations intéressantes concernant Jeanne d’Arc sont les suivantes : elle va acheter une voiture qui sera utilisé au transport rémunéré des personnes,  elle va construire une maison et va faire l’élevage des porcs.
Sur la photo figure les chaussures. Ces chaussures sont pour quelqu’un d’autre avec qui elle travaille dans la même maison.
texts.en:
Jeanne d'Arc is married and 33 years old.   She sells stationery and video products.  She has a one-year-old child who is not old enough to attend school, and she is also financially responsible for another person.  She was born in Rwanda and has a college degree.

She joined ACB in 2009 and this is her second loan cycle.  As a seller in a stationery and video store, and in order to improve the video part of her business, she wants to buy the following sound system equipment: one amplifier, two speakers, one microphone and one laptop computer.  

She is not expecting any difficulty repaying her loan, as long as she is not robbed or doesn't become ill.  In order to further boost her business, she plans to use the following strategies: she will greet her customers warmly, she will ensure their satisfaction and use modern tools and equipment.  Her ambition is to expand her business until she makes a lot of profits.

As far as her family is concerned, she will take care of her child's education, improve her home and eat a better, more nutritious, diet.

Some other interesting facts about Jeanne d'Arc:  She plans to buy a car to provide paid transportation services.  She also intends to build a house and raise pigs.  In the photo, one can see shoes.  These are actually part of another person's business, as Jeanne d'Arc shares her shop with someone else.

loans.use: to buy one amplifier, two speakers, one microphone and one laptop computer.

loans.name: Ariunjargal

texts.en: Mrs. Ariunjargal is 38 years old and lives with her children in a ger, a traditional Mongolian yurt, in Darkhan, which is the second largest city in Mongolia. Her children are 16 and 8 years old and study at a local secondary school.  During the last five years her husband has been working as a contract worker in Korea, and every month he sends some money to the family. When her husband left for Korea, their children were 11 and 3. Since then, Ariunjargal hasn't worked. Ariunjargal has been told that her husband’s contract will expire next year, and her family is impatiently waiting for the moment. Before that time, Ariunjargal had a plan to build a new house to surprise her husband. She will use the money that the husband has sent. Her house building process is going well, with 80% execution, thanks to all her relatives. There is only the plaster, or insulation work, on both sides of the walls, installation of some double-glazed windows, and a low-pressure furnace left to install. The loan Ariunjargal is taking out will be used to complete her new house. By doing this, her family will be provided with a comfortable and spacious house to live in.

loans.use: To complete her new house

loans.name: Scholastica

texts.en:
Scholastica has been in the farming business for the past 17 years with a good income, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan cycle through KADET Ltd. after repaying the previous loan successfully. Scholastica will use the loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and animal feed. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to sell the farm produce to the nearby markets.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and animal feed for her farming business.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Don mariano es un hombre agricultor de 67 años de edad el esta en unión simple con su esposa y vive en Sololá. Junto a sus tres hijos, de  ellos   dos mujeres quienes trabajan como amas de casa y un varón quien esta casado. 
Él se dedica al cultivo de verduras tales como zanahoria y papa esto lo cultiva en una parcela que tiene a  pocos metros de su  vivienda. Esta actividad los realiza desde que el tenia 20 años de edad ya que el no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar en alguna escuela de su comunidad por lo tanto se dedica a cultivar estas verduras para sostener y aportar a la economía de su familia.
 De esta manera ve su necesidad de invertir más capital en estos cultivos ya que por la temporada del año estas verduras mejoran sus precios ahora él solicita un préstamo de Q 3000.00 para comprar  semillas de papa y zanahoria para luego cosecharlas y venderlas en el mercado local.
Con las ganancias de estas cosechas en un futuro le gustaría cultivar en mas parcelas que tiene obteniendo mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Mariano is a 67 year old farmer. He is married and lives in Solola with his three children; two women, who work as homemakers and a son, who is married.

He grows vegetables such as carrots and potatoes, which he grows on a plot he has a few meters from his home. He has been doing this job since he was 20 years old as he didn’t have the opportunity to study in a school in his community therefore he grows vegetables to contribute and support his family financially.

Therefore he sees the need to invest more capital in these crops as the season for these vegetables increase the price. He is requesting a loan of 3000.00 Guatemalan Quetzal to buy potato and carrot seeds to later sow and sell in the local market.

With the profits of these crops in the future he would like to cultivate more plots to obtain better profits.

loans.use: to buy potato and carrot seeds.

loans.name: Philemon

texts.en: Philemon is 26 years old. He is single and sells shoes. With the loan, he wants to buy more shoes to sell. With the profits from the business, he would like to increase his savings for a better future.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his rice farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Doña Ana Maria no es casada, convive con  el papa de sus dos hijos varones que están en etapa escolar, vive en la casa propia donde cuenta con un  cuatro ambientes donde se encuentra el dormitorio, cocina, baño y la  habitación donde hará la obra fina y la utilizará de sala, es de ladrillo y el piso de cemento y machihembré la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona 6 de Marzo de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente trabaja de profesora en el área rural; esta escuela esta ubicada en la zona de Villandrani, siendo el camino lleno de tierra y parte del camino es pavimentado, ella trabaja todos los días de la semana, y los fines de semana da clase particulares a grupos de niños que así desean reforzamientos y así mejorar sus ingresos. El esposo es maestro rural trabajando actualmente en el sector de Poma maya Provincia Omasuyos y ambos colaboran en el pago de los servicios, comida y vestimenta, e incluso en el pago de las deudas.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de estuco, pinturas para la obra fina de vivienda interior, revocado y estuqueado de paredes y puesta de puertas y ventanas. Mejorando así sus condiciones de vida.
El sueño de doña Ana Maria es poder terminar las refacciones de sus cuartos y puedan tener un cuarto cada uno de sus hijos y así tener mejor calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is not married.  She lives with the father of her 2 school-aged boys.  She lives in her own house, which has 4 rooms: a bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, and a room that still needs some final work which will be the living room.  The house is made of brick, with cement and wood floors.  It is located in the "6 de Marzo" neighborhood of the city of El Alto.

Ana Maria currently works as a teacher in a rural area.  This school is located in the Villandrani area, and the road there is partly paved and partly made of dirt.  She works each weekday, and on the weekends she gives private classes to group of children who want to strengthen their skills and in this way increase their incomes.  Her husband also teaches in a rural area, currently in the Poma Maya region of Omasuyos province.  They both contribute to pay for services, food and clothing, and to pay off their debt.

Ana Maria needs a loan to buy stucco and interior paints, so that she can plaster and stucco the walls;  she also wants to put in doors and windows.  This way, she will improve her family's living conditions.

Ana Maria's dream is to be able to finish the construction of her rooms, so that she could have a room for each of her children.  This way, they could have a better quality of life.

This is the first time that Ana Maria has requested a loan jointly from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy stucco and paints to do finishing work on her home

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Karina, de 40 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 21 y 19 años de edad y actualmente se encuentra muy feliz en la espera de su tercer hijo, vive en compañía de su pareja y sus dos hijos en su casa propia que construyó trabajando mucho. La actividad que realiza Karina es la venta de comidas típicas de la zona y asados de carnes como pollo, cerdo y pescado, para ello instala su mesa en el frontis de su casa y desde ahí atiende de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes. Lleva en este negocio de 4 años y cuenta con la ayuda de su hija para la preparación de los potajes y la atención de los clientes, que en su mayoría son sus vecinos y transeúntes. Del mismo modo, pudo comprar un taxi hace 3 meses en el cual trabaja su cónyuge, de esta forma logran suplir las necesidades de su hogar. Le gusta su negocio ya que le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual pueda solventar los gastos de su hogar y la necesidades de sus hijos quienes la motivan para seguir progresando, por lo contrario no le gusta cuando los precios de su insumos suben ya que produce la reducción de sus ganancias pero aun así logra encontrar la rentabilidad en sus ventas. Tiene planes de seguir con su negocio y mantenerlo, ampliando con mejores sillas y mesas para brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este es el primer préstamo individual con MFP, se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que le están brindando para seguir con su negocio y avanzar con sus planes. Por otro lado comenta sentirse muy confiada trabajando con la institución pues considera que le están brindando todas las facilidades para ser una buena socia.
Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas a precio por mayor para así tener mejores ganancias, tales como arroz, aceites, papas otros.
texts.en:
Karina, who is 40 years old, is a hard-working woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She lives with her partner and has two children who are 21 and 19 years old.  She is currently very happy to be expecting her third child.  She lives with her husband and their two children in their own home, which they were able to build through a lot of work.  Karina's business is selling food, local dishes and roast meats like chicken, pig and fish.  To do this, she set up a table in the front area of her house where she gives friendly and cordial service to her customers.  She has been in this business for four years, and her daughter helps her to prepare the stews and serve the customers.  The majority of her customers are her neighbors and passersby.  In addition, three months ago Karina was able to purchase a taxi, which her husband uses for work.  And so they are able to meet their household expenses.  Karina likes her business, as it affords her an income that meets the household expenses and her children's needs.  Her children are her motivation to continue progressing.  On the other hand, she doesn't like when the prices of her supplies go up, as it results in an income reduction.  But even so, she finds a way to make her sales profitable.  Karina plans to continue with her business, to maintain it and expand with more chairs and tables to give her customers greater comfort.  This is her first individual loan with MFP.  She feels grateful for the financial assistance they are offering her to keep her business going and advance her plans.  She also says that she feels very confident working with the institution, as she feels that they are offering everything she needs to be a good member.
To improve her earnings, Karina will invest the requested amount of 2500 nuevos soles (USD$975) in the whole sale purchase of the ingredients she needs to prepare her foods, like rice, cooking oils, potatoes and other items.

loans.use: to purchase rice, cooking oils, potatoes and other items.

loans.name: Gantumur

texts.en:
Gantumur is 36 years old, helpful, and an open-minded person. He lives with his wife, daughter, and son in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. His daughter Namuundari is 8 years old and his son Khatantumur is 11 years old. They are both in school. 

Since 2008, he has been working as a steel reinforcing worker. In Mongolia, unemployment is high. That’s why he and his friends have organized a maintenance crew. His crew does jobs such as building houses, setting up heating systems, painting, masonry, and any construction work. His wife is a cook for this maintenance crew. 

This summer, he bought land and a wooden house. He already paid most of the money, but still owes 2,000,000 MNT to the seller. The reason he is asking for this loan is to pay the rest of the money for his land and wooden house. Before this summer, his family rented a 1-room apartment. He said that this winter, they can now live comfortably and in peace.

loans.use: to pay the rest of the money for his land and wooden house.

loans.name: Annastasia

texts.en:
Anastasia is a 38-year-old business-lady. She is married to Mwangangi, a businessman. They are blessed with six children. She has been in the livestock trading business for the past five years with a monthly income of 5,180 KES, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan term from KADET Ltd. after being introduced to the loan program by a KADET staff member. Anastasia will use the loan to buy more goats and sheep to fatten and later sell at a profit. 

With the anticipated profits from the business, she will plow back into the business. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a pick-up truck for transporting livestock to the nearby markets.

loans.use: to buy more goats and sheep to fatten and later sell at a profit.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica has been running a greengrocery business for the past ten years with a monthly income of 20,000 KES, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her third loan from KADET Ltd. after repaying the previous loans successfully. Veronica will use the loan to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business.

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a retail shop.

loans.use: to buy fruits and green vegetables for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of fruits to resell.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
Marcelino es un padre de familia de 33 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y a su menor hijo. La casa está ubicada en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito agrícola de Chulucanas, en la región Piura. Actualmente ya cuenta con todos los servicios básicos.

La actividad que desarrolla es la crianza de ganado menor (ovino, porcino y aves de corral), los cuales al alcanzar peso y tamaño ideal son comercializados en el mercado local. Cuenta con más de 04 años de experiencia en la ganadería. Adicionalmente es trabajador estable en una empresa agroindustrial de la zona. Los ingresos que obtiene de estas actividades le sirven para sacar adelante a su menor hijo.

Marcelino se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles. El ya había trabajado anteriormente con un crédito financiado a través de Kiva y le fue bastante bien, por ello se encuentra muy agradecido. El destino del crédito actual será para el mantenimiento del ganado, adquisición de alimento balanceado y mejoras en sus corrales. Marcelino agradece de antemano a las personas que le ayuden en esta oportunidad
texts.en:
Marcelino is a 33-year-old father. He lives in his own house together with his wife and their young son. The house is located in one of the settlements which make up the agricultural district of Chulucanas, in the Piura region. It already has all of the basic utility services.

The work he carries out is raising small livestock (sheep, pigs and poultry). When they reach the ideal size and weight, they are sold at the local market. He has more than 4 years of experience raising animals. In addition, he has a stable job in an agro-industrial company in his area. The income he receives from these activities allows him to help his young son get ahead in life.

Marcelino is currently requesting a loan for 2000 new soles. He had previously worked with a loan financed through Kiva, and it went very well for him, for which he is very grateful. The aim of the current loan will be to maintain his livestock, buy commercial feed and make improvements to his enclosures. Marcelino expresses appreciation in advance to the people who will help with this opportunity.

loans.use: to maintain his livestock, buy commercial feed and improve his enclosures.

loans.name: Canane Group
